m64tweak.name: Stars for Toads
m64tweak.description: Modify the number of stars required for each star-giving Toad to appear.

patch.name: Stars for 1st Toad
patch.description: Modify the number of stars required for the first star-giving Toad to appear.

patch.name: Stars for 2nd Toad
patch.description: Modify the number of stars required for the second star-giving Toad to appear.

patch.name: Stars for 3rd Toad
patch.description: Modify the number of stars required for the third star-giving Toad to appear.
